title: Absolute Planetary Book Two
description: Collects issues 13-27 of the original series as well as 14 pages of additional content.As the series hurtles towards its conclusion, Snow initiates the second part of his comeback plan to stop The Four, makes a startling revelation about his past, and uncovers information on the world's first moon shot ... in 1851! Will Snow be able to draw the last of the Four out of hiding, and can he act before his teammates lose their faith in him?
author: Warren Ellis
